body_html:
i have same problem.
i use openblas and set openMP ON
then i set openblas_num_threads=1 and OMP_num_threads=4
but only one core is runing
why?

then i set openblas_num_threads=4 and OMP_num_threads=1
the 4 core is runing ,but it maybe the openBLAS is using 4 core ,not caffe2
how can i do that let caffe2 use openMP to run multi-threads?

body:
i have same problem.
i use openblas and set openMP ON
then i set openblas_num_threads=1 and OMP_num_threads=4
but only one core is runing
why?


then i set openblas_num_threads=4 and OMP_num_threads=1
the 4 core is runing ,but it maybe the openBLAS is using 4 core ,not caffe2
how can i do that let caffe2 use openMP to run multi-threads?
